text:
tomcat.properties:
security.authentication=false

logged error:
port must be TRUE or FALSE
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
tomcat.properties is used for auto-starting Tomcat by mod_jserv.  This is
not a supported feature in Tomcat 3.x.  The error message is a "cut/paste"
error. From a quick code inspection, is displayed only if there is
in fact an error.  This "cut/paste" error is present in all Tomcat 3.x
implementations of mod_jserv.  Since auto-starting is not a supported feature,
I'm marking it "wontfix".
